itemDisplayName: Create a Web App protected by Application Gateway v2
description: This template creates an Azure Web App with Access Restriction for an Application Gateway v2. The Application Gateway is deployed in a vNet (subnet) which have 'Microsoft.Web' Service Endpoint enabled. Web App restricts access to traffic from subnet.
summary: Create a Web App plus Application Gateway v2 using a template. Access to Web App is protected with Service Endpoint Access Restriction from Application Gateway subnet.
